conversation.content: Good morning. I need to switch from electronic statements to paper statements for my account, please.
Good morning. I'd be happy to help you with that change. May I have your account number and the last 4 digits of your social security number for verification?
My account number is 4829-7631-902 and the last four digits are 7264.
Thank you. I've located your account. I see you've been receiving electronic statements since March 2022. Before I make this change, I should mention there's a $2.95 monthly fee for paper statements.
I understand there's a fee. I still need to make this change for my records.
Certainly. I'm updating your preferences now. Your first paper statement will arrive within 7 to 10 business days, and you'll receive them monthly after that.
Will I still have access to the electronic versions as well?

Absolutely. You'll continue to have full access to your online portal where you can view and download statements from the past 24 months. The paper statements are an additional service, not a replacement for digital access.
Perfect. Can you confirm which address the statements will be sent to?
Of course. I show your mailing address as 1847 Riverside Drive, Suite 200, Columbus, Ohio 43215. Is that correct?
That's correct. How far back can I request paper copies of previous statements?
You can request paper copies of statements from the past 7 years. There's a $5 fee per statement for historical copies, and they typically arrive within 5 business days of the request.
I'd like to order copies for January through June of this year, please.
I can process that for you right now. That's 6 statements at $5 each, for a total of $30, which will appear on your next billing cycle. Would you like me to proceed?
Yes, please proceed with that order.
Perfect. I've submitted your request for historical statements covering January through June 2024. You should receive those within 5 business days at your registered address.
Excellent. Can you send me an email confirmation of these changes?
Absolutely. I'm sending a confirmation email to your registered address at m.davidson@techcorp.com right now. It will include your reference number REF-892734-ST for this service change.
Thank you. That covers everything I needed today.
You're very welcome. Your changes are all set, and you should receive your email confirmation within the next 10 minutes. Is there anything else I can help you with today?

scenario: trying to get a paper statement instead of electronic
